KarEbinR Range

The KarEbinR range was born from the name of the Carabiner ring used in rock and mountain climbing.

The KarEbinR range is designed to be an essential part of your equipment in any environment that requires strength, reliability, rigidity, power and safety from a PVC wall cladding range.

Just the same service that every person deserves, when they are climbing their mountain

KarEbinR is an innovative brand that focusses on getting high-quality products into the marketplace at a reasonable price. The journey starts with our Kleen white sheet

Platinum Service

KarEbinR is an innovative company that focusses on getting a high quality products into the marketplace at a reasonable price

Our products are already used in many large organisations including some familiar household brands such as; McDonald’s, Amazon, Starbucks, NHS, Hilton & Tesco – to name a few

We now have the same materials that they trust and use readily available to you with our KarEbinR range, so go on give us a try – we are confident that you will be happy with our products and services
